summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue and Twelfth Avenue South, from Jackson Street to East Denny Way, et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 24035, creating Local Improvement District No. 2325 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
